original_text: They shall run to and fro in the city; they shall run upon the wall, they shall climb up upon the houses; they shall enter in at the windows like a thief.
korean_text: 성중에 뛰어 들어가며 성 위에 달리며 집에 기어 오르며 도둑 같이 창으로 들어가니

sentences.original_text: They shall run to and fro in the city
They shall run upon the wall
They shall climb up upon the houses
They shall enter in at the windows like a thief
